dialogue.speaker: Lady Arinthe
dialogue.text: Welcome, young adventurer. I've been expecting you.

dialogue.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogue.text: Expecting me? How did you know I was coming?

dialogue.speaker: Lady Arinthe
dialogue.text: The winds carry many whispers. And yours is a name that has been spoken of often in our village.

dialogue.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogue.text: I see. Well, I've come seeking answers about my past.
